ILVE Appliance Repair – Certified Service for Italian Luxury Ranges and Ovens

White-Glove Repairs for ILVE’s Culinary Masterpieces

ILVE appliances are a celebration of craftsmanship—hand-assembled in Italy and designed to turn kitchens into design statements. With bold color palettes, brass trim, and exceptional performance, ILVE ranges and ovens aren’t just cooking appliances—they’re heirloom pieces. When these masterpieces need service, they require more than just a repair technician. They need a specialist who understands the art behind the engineering.

At ZARICCI Luxury Appliance Repair, we proudly offer ILVE appliance repair for discerning homeowners, architects, and estate managers. Our technicians deliver certified precision, genuine OEM parts, and a white-glove in-home experience that matches the elegance of ILVE’s design legacy.

🔧 Why ILVE Owners Trust ZARICCI

  • ✅ Factory-Certified Technicians
    We’re trained to repair ILVE’s entire appliance range—including the Majestic, Nostalgie, and Professional Plus series—ensuring flawless performance and preserving the appliance’s visual appeal.
  • ✅ Genuine ILVE OEM Parts
    Every component we use is sourced directly from ILVE or approved distributors to protect your warranty, ensure longevity, and maintain authentic Italian craftsmanship.
  • ✅ Same-Day or Next-Day Appointments
    We offer priority repair service across Southern California—perfect for busy households, private chefs, and curated kitchens that can’t afford to wait.
  • ✅ White-Glove In-Home Service
    Our technicians protect your cabinetry, finishes, and flooring—working cleanly, quietly, and with deep respect for your home’s aesthetic.

🛠️ We Repair All ILVE Appliances

🔥 ILVE Gas, Dual-Fuel, and Induction Ranges

  • Burner ignition failure or uneven flame
  • Temperature calibration and fan noise
  • Oven not heating, broiler not working, or convection failures
  • Control knob, switch, or display issues

🔥 ILVE Wall Ovens & Built-In Ovens

  • Inaccurate cooking temperatures
  • Faulty timers, broilers, or convection fans
  • Smart feature and touchpad troubleshooting

🧊 ILVE Cooktops & Range Tops

  • Low or inconsistent flame on gas models
  • Unresponsive induction zones
  • Cracked glass or electrical panel faults

🎛️ ILVE Control Panels & Smart Systems

  • Display malfunctions or unresponsive controls
  • Cycle errors, timer malfunctions
  • Wiring, switch, or control board replacements

Whether you’re managing a modern minimalist kitchen or a European-inspired culinary suite, ZARICCI ensures your ILVE appliance performs like the day it was installed.

👨‍🔧 The ZARICCI White-Glove Repair Process

  1. Effortless Booking
    Call or schedule online. Our concierge team arranges your appointment discreetly and efficiently.
  2. Certified Diagnosis
    A factory-trained ILVE specialist arrives on time, prepared to assess your appliance and explain the issue with transparency.
  3. Detailed, Upfront Estimate
    We provide a written repair quote before we begin—no surprises, no fine print.
  4. Precision Repairs with OEM Parts
    Every repair is executed with authentic ILVE components and to exact factory specifications.
  5. Final Testing & Immaculate Clean-Up
    We ensure your appliance is operating perfectly and your kitchen is returned to showroom condition.

From hillside estates to designer lofts, we bring expert ILVE repair directly to your kitchen—with discretion and speed.
